abstract: Harvey Araton On Football column on New York Giants 27-24 victory over Buffalo Bills; says that the New York's defense, which has been plagued by injuries this season, secured victory with a late-game turnover.
snippet: Given that this season has already seen the Giants’ fortunes upended over and over, the last four minutes of play in Sunday’s Giants-Bills game were fairly typical.
lead_paragraph: Given that this season has already seen the Giants’ fortunes upended over and over, the last four minutes of play in Sunday’s Giants-Bills game were fairly typical.

headline.main: It’s Another Adventure in Sudden Reversals
headline.print_headline: It’s Another Adventure in Sudden Reversals
headline.seo: Giants Have Another Adventure in Sudden Reversals
